snippet: Politicians hoping to secure factory jobs for their states were among the visitors at the Detroit auto show’s preview week.
abstract: Politicians hoping to secure factory jobs for their states from the rebounding automotive industry are among the visitors at the Detroit Auto Show’s preview week; many spend most of their time meeting with auto executives about new jobs, fuel-economy standards and future products.

byline.original: By NICK BUNKLEY and BILL VLASIC

lead_paragraph: Politicians hoping to secure factory jobs for their states were among the visitors at the Detroit auto show’s preview week.

headline.seo: Auto Show Blends Politics and Pragmatism
headline.main: A Blend of Politics and Pragmatism at the Auto Show
headline.print_headline: A Blend of Politics and Pragmatism at the Auto Show
